text_logic_form: The triangles $ABC$ and $FGH$ are congruent to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangles $ABC$ and $FGH$ are congruent to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $FB$ is $4x+1$ units.
The length of the line $FH$ is $11$ units.
The length of the line $HG$ is $3x-2$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $13$ units.
The length of the line $CB$ is $7$ units.
The length of the line $CA$ is $2x+5$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $FG$, $FH$, $GH$, forming a triangle $FGH$.
